title: 105_hr1633
content: Children's Education Tax Credit Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish an annual tax credit for qualified educational expenses paid by a taxpayer for the taxpayer, a spouse, or a dependent. Provides for: (1) credit proration in cases of shared expenses, (2) inclusion of certain home schooling expenses. And (3) adjustments for certain scholarships and veterans' benefits. Defines eligible educational institution as an institution of higher education, or a vocational, secondary, or elementary school.
